Londell Smith (amụrụ n'August 14, 1968) nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya Nikko London, bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
A maara ya nke ọma na VH1's reality show Love & Hip Hop: Atlanta.
N'afọ 2011, Nikko malitere ịrụ ọrụ ọhụrụ ya na Margeaux, nkè a na-akpọ Invaderz
Duo ahụ wepụtara mixtape dubstep ha Just Landed n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nkè afọ ahụ.
N'afọ 2014, a tọhapụrụ teepu mmekọahụ nke gosipụtara Nikko na Love & Hip Hop: Atlanta star Mimi Faust, site na Vivid Entertainment nkè akpọrọ Scandal in Atlanta

Ọ ghọwo otu n'ime teepụ mmekọahụ kachasị ewu ewu nke ụlọ ọrụ na-ese ihe na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ wepụtara. A họpụtara ya màkà AVN Award maka Best Celebrity Sex Tape na 2015, na-emeri Tila Tequila. Nikko na Faust kwuru na e zuuru akpa ha nwèrè teepu mmekọahụ ma zigara teepu ahụ na Vivid Entertainment site na isi iyi a na-amaghị aha ya.
Ọ lụrụ Margeaux Simms kemgbe afọ 2007, mànà ha abụọ anọgidewo na-ekewa, ébé ọ bụ na Simms agafeela na mmekọrịta ọhụrụ.
